title: RP
body: I'm pretty new to the game and I recently just reached Lvl 6 but there was a champion I wanted to get named jinx and I also wanted to get the star guardian jinx skin, is a 20$ or 25$ gift card enough to buy a champion and a skin or do I have to get a 50$ gift card?

replies.body:
It depends on where you're located and what payment method you're using since the pricing and RP are sometimes different depending on those factors. As it stands at the moment, those items will cost a total of 2795 RP, so the $20 bundle in the USA while using Paypal or a credit card.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
